ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:42:06 [Issue ID 4000-108388] urn:comicvine:4000-108388 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:13:14. [Issue ID 131460]
ComicInfo.Summary: As Cy-Gor swims to the shores of Manhattan, a religious zealot, Chow, invokes the goddess Kali on the subway. As Mort and Warner go in search of Cy-Gor, he manages to disappear into the same subway system in which the goddess of death, Kali, is currently demanding sacrifices. When Cy-Gor and Kali meet, Cy-Gor does not succumb to the goddess of death, but instead beheads her. The sniveling Chow now declares his eternal obedience to the new face of death: Cy-Gor
ComicInfo.Title: Needles and Pins
ComicInfo.Colorist: Todd Broeker,Jay Fotos,Drew Hutchinson,Todd Broeker,Jay Fotos,Drew Hutchinson
